transportAdvice: Tirana's compact city center is highly walkable, with most major attractions reachable on foot; the city also has a bus network covering tourist areas, and taxis are widely available and affordable throughout the city.

weather.description: Cool and wet winter month with frequent rain and overcast skies, requiring a warm jacket and waterproof layer.
Still cool and rainy with occasional mild spells, but winter conditions persist through most of the month.
Early spring brings milder temperatures and a mix of sunny days and showers, making it a pleasant but unpredictable time to visit.
Warm spring weather with blooming greenery and occasional afternoon showers; comfortable for sightseeing.
Pleasantly warm and mostly sunny, one of the better months to visit before summer heat sets in.
Hot and dry with long sunny days; ideal for outdoor exploration but shade and hydration are important.
Peak summer heat with very little rain; expect intense afternoon sun and warm evenings perfect for nightlife.
Equally hot and dry as July, with clear skies dominating; the city is lively but heat can be intense midday.
Temperatures begin to ease in late summer, with warm days and comfortable evenings making it an excellent travel window.
Mild autumn weather with increasing cloud cover and occasional rain, but still many pleasant sunny days.
Noticeably cooler and wetter as autumn deepens, with frequent rain and grey skies returning.
Cold and rainy winter conditions set in, with short days and a festive atmosphere in the city center.
